import{makeStyles}from'@material-ui/core/styles';var useStyles=makeStyles(function(theme){return{body:{display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',justifyContent:'center',alignItems:'center',marginTop:theme.spacing(7.5)},// styles for text
text:{width:'31.93rem',height:'5.875rem',marginTop:theme.spacing(3.75),marginBottom:theme.spacing(3.75)},typo:{fontSize:'2rem'},textSecond:{width:'29.06rem',height:'1.6875rem',marginTop:theme.spacing(1.875),marginBottom:theme.spacing(3.75)},typoSub:{fontSize:'1rem'},// for yes or no buttons
